title: Game crashed on zilean bomb death

replies.body:
Hey Kira Onime,

I won't lie to you, I have never heard of Zilean Bomb's crashing a game of League of Legends.  Although, I have every confidence we can Chrono Shift your computer!  (I thought the joke was funny at least...)

Typically, when something like this occurs, it is usually due to outdated Graphics Drivers.  Make sure that you visit the website of your Graphics Card Manufacturer (either AMD, Nvidia, or Intel), and download the latest drivers for your specific Graphics Card.  

Once done, and if you are still experiencing issues with these types of random crashes, make sure that you submit a ticket to Player Support, which you can do here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a ticket, make sure that you include the following latest and most up to date information:

1) Dxdiag information: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20100477-obtaining-a-direct-x-diagnostic-or-dxdiag

2) Please send your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22128450-League-of-Legends-Logs

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list

My drivers are up to date. I updated last week.

This crash tho is really the only first time I've experienced any crash at all.

I've been killed by a zilean bomb multiple times before, could just be some freak accident.


I'll keep note if anything happens again.
Zil's bombs broke your game.  In dominion i had an Attack Speed stacking Udyr bear smack my game to death lol.
